longInfo:
Passport required.
- Nationals of Luxembourg are allowed to enter with an expired
  normal passport. The passport is accepted when expired for a
  maximum of 5 years. 
- Nationals of Luxembourg traveling without a passport must
  have a document accepted for entry, valid for the period of
  intended stay. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to nationals of
  Luxembourg. 
- Holders of an ID card for children under 15 years of age
  issued to nationals of Luxembourg. 

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Luxembourg will be expected
  to hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State . 
- All minors who are nationals of Luxembourg are expected to
  hold their own travel document.
Additional Information:
- Nationals of Luxembourg staying in Switzerland for more than
  3 months must apply for a residence permit.
- Geneva airport (GVA) is located by convention in
  Switzerland
